keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: Spanish and Moroccan police officers on Tuesday arrested four people suspected of being members of a cell that sought to recruit fighters.

headline.print_headline: Europe; Spain: Arrests in ISIS Recruitment Case
headline.main: Spain: Arrests in ISIS Recruitment Case

snippet: Spanish and Moroccan police officers on Tuesday arrested four people suspected of being members of a cell that sought to recruit fighters.
abstract: Spanish and Moroccan police arrest four on suspicion of recruiting members to Islamic State group and attempting to acquire weapons and bomb-making materials.
